jexer.demos

Class DemoTextWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • jexer.TWidget
      • jexer.TWindow
        • jexer.demos.DemoTextWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<TWidget>

    public class DemoTextWindow
extends TWindow
    This window demonstates the TText, THScroller, and TVScroller widgets.
